headline: Berkshire’s New CEO Just Offloaded DaVita Stocks: Should You Sell Yours Too?
summary: For the first time since 1965, Berkshire Hathaway has made a major trade under the direction of someone other than former CEO Warren Buffett. The conglomerate recently sold roughly 1.65 million shares...
